#labels Gameplay
= Game play =

You'll start off in a non-moddable [ChmmrExplorer]. Its only real capabilities will be interstellar travel, a bit of fighting, and landing on planets. Early on your Explorer will be destroyed and you'll get a moddable [PrecursorShip] in its place - much like the Vindicator.

 (See my comment in [HowItStarts]. -- jorisvddonk)
